messages.message: Would someone be willing  to quickly summarize where we should put different types of tasks on Asana during our company weekly today? Given that we have quite a few new people, and also since we just have so many boards available and in-use, it’s not always clear. For instance, when writing down a task for a new feature, I am unsure if it should go into the product’s board, in a checklist within the product backlog, within the priority board, the planning board, my personal weekly snippet, a feature request board, etc… Would be interested in hearing how others decide.
I would love to know as well. cc @Ted should our proj refiner work be in asana? also are we moving to a different task management tool? cc @dlluncor
We’re working on bringing up jira, going to setup/test out some projects, templates, queries and boards then work on a migration plan
@Heymian is there a date for this?
don’t want to put dates in people’s mouths, but i would think this coming week or so
